类 DefaultEventLoopGroup

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    直接已知子类:
    LocalEventLoopGroup

    public class DefaultEventLoopGroup
extends MultithreadEventLoopGroup
    MultithreadEventLoopGroup which must be used for the local transport.

      Create a new EventExecutor which will later then accessible via the MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.next() method.

        参数:
        nThreads - the number of threads to use

      • DefaultEventLoopGroup

        public DefaultEventLoopGroup(int nThreads,
                             Executor executor)
        Create a new instance
        参数:
        nThreads - the number of threads to use
        executor - the Executor to use, or null if the default should be used.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newChild

        protected EventLoop newChild(Executor executor,
                             Object... args)
                      throws Exception
        从类复制的说明: MultithreadEventExecutorGroup
        Create a new EventExecutor which will later then accessible via the MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.next() method. This method will be called for each thread that will serve this MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.
        指定者:
        newChild 在类中 MultithreadEventLoopGroup
        抛出:
        Exception
